title: Establishment of a fruit-based processing factory in Sri Lanka
decision_details: - ORANA, one of the World's largest Denmark suppliers of fruit based raw materials which supplies beverages associated with milk and fruit-based raw materials required for bakery manufactures has made a request for a land in extent of 2 acres from the Industrial Zone situated in Pannala for the establishment of a fruit based processing factory. Under Stage I of the proposed project, the investor has planned to invest US$ 1.5 million under which around 30 job opportunities will be newly generated. Accordingly, the proposal made by the Minister of Industries and Supply Chain Management, to give a portion of land from the Pannala Industrial Zone to implement the said project subject to an Agreement being signed between the ORANA institute and the Industrial Development Board, was approved by the Cabinet.
